description: Magic Knight Rayearth begins when three junior high school girls hear a voice asking them to save a world called Cephiro. The voice belongs to http://anidb.net/ch12490 [Princess Emeraude], the Pillar whose will maintains the peace of this magical world where belief is power. But the peace in Cephiro is now threatened as Princess Emeraude is imprisoned and monsters begin to invade the land. With her last bit of strength, the princess summons forth the three girls destined to become the Magic Knights in the hopes of saving her world.

REGULAR.description:
The Knights are introduced and receive their mandate, to save the land of Cephiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Magic Knight Shidou
L`arrivée des légendaires Magic Knights !
The Birth of the Legendary Magic Knights
伝説のマジックナイト始動

REGULAR.description:
The Knights meet a mentor and choose their weapons.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chinmoku no Mori no Soushi Presea
Master Smith Presea of the Forest of Silence
Presea, le forgeron de la Forêt du Silence !
沈黙の森の創師プレセア

REGULAR.description:
The three girls meet an ally in their quest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ferio the Young, Handsome, Mysterious Swordsman
Ferio, le beau guerrier mystérieux !
Nazo no Bishounen Kenshi Ferio
謎の美少年剣士フェリオ

REGULAR.description:
The Knights meet their strongest enemy yet, and exercise some of their newly found magic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alcyone, the Vengeful Sorceress
Alcyone, une magicienne déterminée !
Shuunen no Masoushi Alcyone
執念の魔操士アルシオーネ

REGULAR.description:
The enemy is again defeated. New magic spells are uncovered and a new enemy is encountered.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Koubutsu Escudo
Escudo, the Legendary Ore
L`Escudo, le minerai légendaire !
伝説の鉱物エスクード

REGULAR.description:
A friend is killed, and vengeance is sworn--on both sides of the battlefield.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inochi o Kaketa Presea no Buki
Lives at Stake - Presea`s Weapons
Presea forge au péril de sa vie !
命をかけたプレセアの武器

REGULAR.description:
Trickery is used to defeat the enemy, but the best laid plans go awry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ferio in Desperation - A Love in the Desert
Le sacrifice de Ferio. Amour des sables !
Sutemi no Ferio Sabaku no Koi
捨て身のフェリオ砂漠の恋

REGULAR.description:
A spy has entered the circle of the three Knights.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le terrifiant piège d`Ascot, l`invocateur !
Shoukanshi Ascot no Kyoufu no Wana
The Terrifying Trap of Summoner Ascot
召喚士アスコットの恐怖の罠

REGULAR.description:
The girls are separated, and mirages arise to confuse reality.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Instant critique pour les Magic Knights !
Magic Knight Saidai no Kiki!
The Magic Knights` Greatest Crisis
マジックナイト最大の危機!

REGULAR.description:
The girls are closer to saving Cephiro and individual strengths are tested and strengthened
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`éveil de Ceres, le Gardien légendaire !
The Revival of Selece, the Legendary Mashin
Yomigaeru Densetsu no Mashin Selece
よみがえる伝説の魔神セレス

REGULAR.description:
The ally Ferio comes to the aid of the three again, and a neighboring village is saved from Zagato.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Isekai Cephiro no Mashin Densetsu
La légende des Gardiens Sacrés de Cefiro !
The Mashin Legend of Cephiro, Another World
異世界セフィーロの魔神伝説

REGULAR.description:
Illusions once again confuse the three Knights, and an enemy becomes an ally?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Caldina, la redoutable illusionniste !
Fearsome Illusionist Caldina
Osorubeki Genwakushi Caldina
恐るべき幻惑士カルディナ

REGULAR.description:
Zagato is on the verge of defeat as another of his minions becomes an ally in the fight to save the Princess.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Taisetsu na Mono
La chose la plus précieuse au monde !
The Most Valuable Thing in This World
この世界でいちばん大切なもの

REGULAR.description:
A Knight saves her sister Knights and a monster is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikaru, Umi, Fuu no Yuzurenai Negai
Hikaru, Umi, and Fuu`s Unyielding Wish
La détermination inébranlable de Hikaru, Fû et Umi !
光, 海, 風のゆずれない願い

REGULAR.description:
Deceit and disguise jeopardize the trio and Ferio. Zagato is emboldened to bring forth another warrior.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Ni no Mashin: Kuujin Windam
Le deuxième Gardien: le Gardien Céleste, Windom !
The Second Mashin: Windam, Lord of the Skies
第二の魔神・空神ウィンダム

REGULAR.description:
The three Knights encounter another soldier of Zagato. He too, however, has an altered memory and surprises his Master and the girls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Powerful Foe! Lafarga the Swordmaster
Kyouteki! Kentoushi Lafarga
Un redoutable ennemi : Rafaga, le guerrier !
強敵! 剣闘士ラファーガ

REGULAR.description:
Another battle with Zagato`s soldiers. Is the enemy weakening?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inouva no Shoutai to Yomigaeru Kioku
Le vrai visage d`Innova. La mémoire retrouvée !
The Truth about Inouva, and Return of Memories
イノーバの正体とよみがえる記憶

REGULAR.description:
The Knights are closer than ever to their victory and their return home to Tokyo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le dernier Gardien : Le Gardien du Feu, Rayearth !
Saigo no Mashin: Enjin Rayearth
The Last Mashin: RayEarth, Lord of Fire
最後の魔神・炎神レイアース

REGULAR.description:
The Knights unify in attempting to rout Zagato. But the most important surprise awaits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confrontation finale : Les Magic Knights contre Zagato !
Showdown! The Magic Knights Versus Zagato
Taiketsu! Mahou Kishi VS Zagato
対決! 魔法騎士 VS ザガート

REGULAR.description:
The ultimate secret is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Mahou Kishi! Kyoui no Shinjitsu
Les légendaires Magic Knights. L`incroyable vérité !
The Unbelievable Truth about the Legendary Magic Knights
伝説の魔法騎士! 驚異の真実

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru, Umi, and Fuu have been reunited with their families, but their hearts are still not at ease. The three promise to meet each other at Tokyo Tower, the place where they first met. Suddenly, with another mysterious flash of light, the three girls are whisked back to Cephiro, where Mokona and Clef await them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Departure and New Ties
Départ pour l`aventure et nouveaux liens !
Shuppatsu to Arata na Kizuna
出発と新たな絆

REGULAR.description:
Now that Cephiro has lost its Pillar, Princess Emeraude, it is under attack from three countries â€“ Autozam, Chizeta, and Fahren! Clef doesn`t want the girls to get involved in this new war, but Hikaru Umi, and Fuu agree to it on their own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cefiro et les 3 pays
Cephiro and the Three Countries
Cephiro to Mittsu no Kuni
セフィーロと三つの国

REGULAR.description:
Ferio greets the three girls upon their return to the castle and explains that he is the younger brother of Princess Emeraude. The three girls are reunited with their old friends Caldina, Lafarga, and Ascot. They are introduced to Lantis, the younger brother of High Priest Zagato, who recently returned home from Autozam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Autozam no Shinkou to Lantis
Autozam`s Invasion and Lantis
L`attaque de Autozam... Lantis !
オートザムの侵攻とランティス

REGULAR.description:
Late that night, Umi visits Clef, to apologize for originally not wanting to become a Magic Knight. Meanwhile, Fuu and Ferio were talking about Princess Emeraude and Hikaru awakes from a nightmare, and wanders sleeplessly around the castle. She finds Lantis comforting Mira. Suddenly, Autozam`s battleship NSX appears above the Sephiro castle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les Magic Knights et le Vaisseau NSX
Magic Knights and the Battleship NSX
Mahou Kishi to Senkan NSX
魔法騎士と戦艦NSX

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru and company head out to survey the NSX, but before them stands Alcyone! Hikaru, amidst the attacks from Alcyone, tries to convince her to fight along side them, but suddenly a change befalls Alcyone! She beings talking with an eerie voice that Hikaru has heard in her nightmares!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikaru and Nova in Her Dreams
Hikaru et la Nova des rêves !
Hikaru to Yume no Naka no Nova
光と夢の中のノヴァ

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru, Umi, and Fuu ask Eagle why Autozam is invading Cephiro, when a giant metallic dragon appeared above them! It is Dome, the mobile fortress of Fahren, led by First Princess Aska, who wishes to become the Pillar of Cephiro. The girls follow Eagle`s FTO which flew off to spy on Dome.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les Magic Knights et Aska de Fahren !
Magic Knights and Aska of Fahren
Mahou Kishi to Fahren no Aska
魔法騎士とファーレンのアスカ

REGULAR.description:
The deterioration of Cephiro gains peed, and the girls must find a new Pillar soon. When about the qualifications for someone to become the Pillar, Clef shows the girls Princess Emeraude`s crown. He tells them that only the one worthy of becoming the Pillar can touch the crown.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cephiro no Hashira no Himitsu
Le secret du pilier de Cefiro !
The Secret of the Pillar of Cephiro
セフィーロの柱の秘密

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru and Lantis embarked on a journey in search of a new Pillar. Before them is a desolate wasteland so different from what Cephiro once looked like. In addition, the monsters that roam the land have grown in power. Eagle attacks the traveling pair and captures Hikaru. Lantis tries to follow, but Alcyone stands in his way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikaru and Lantis` Dangerous Journey
Hikaru to Lantis no Kiken na Tabi
Le périlleux voyage de Lantis et Hikaru
光とランティスの危険な旅

REGULAR.description:
Umi and Fuu, sensing Hikaru is in danger, get into their Run Gods and fly off. Meanwhile. Hikaru awakens from her dream with Nova realizing that she is aboard the Battleship NSX. She is taken to Eagle, where Eagle explains why Autozam is invading Cephiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eagle and the Captured Hikaru
Eagle to Torawareta Hikaru
Eagle... Hikaru prisonnière !
イーグルと捕らわれた光

REGULAR.description:
"I am Nova, the one that will kill Hikaru..." Hikaru defends herself against Nova who ruthlessly attacks. Umi and Fuu arrive, but the three Rune-Gods are dragged into an alternative dimension created by Nova. Debonair appears to the three girls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nova and Regalia, Mashin of the Devil
Nova et Regalia, le gardien démoniaque légendaire !
Nova to Akuma no Mashin Regalia
ノヴァと悪魔の魔神レガリア

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru returns to the castle, but with her sword broken, she cannot call for her Rune-God. Meanwhile, Clef`s group captures Alcyone and interrogates her. Clef, feeling something more behind Alcyone`s words, becomes even more concerned. Suddenly, Bravada the mobile fortress of Chizeta arrives at Cephiro carrying the two princesses Tarta and Tatra.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chizeta no Idou Yousai to Tatakaenai Hikaru
Chizeta`s Mobile Fortress, and a Powerless Hikaru
Forteresse mobile de Chizeta... Hikaru désarmée !
チゼータの移動要塞と戦えない光

REGULAR.description:
Umi and Fuu head out to investigate without Hikaru, and encounter the guardian spirits of Chizeta. Aska from Fahren reappears in the skies above Cephiro for a rematch. Aska tries to prevent the Djinn from taking the two Rune-gods...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umi et Fû... Fahren et Chizeta !
Umi/Fuu and Fahren/Chizeta
Umi/Fuu to Fahren/Chizeta
海・風とファーレン・チゼータ

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru sits depressed, unable to help her two kidnapped friends. Seeing Hikaru so sad, Presea is determined to revive the broken sword. Nova appears in Hikau`s heart and tells her that every hardship she has faced is all Emeraude`s fault. Hikaru, attacked by Nova`s words, slowly falls into the darkness within
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikaru no Negai to Presea no Himitsu
Hikaru`s Wish and Presea`s Secret
Le vœu de Hikaru et le secret de Presea
光の願いとプレセアの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Nova skillfully confuses Hikaru her by distorting her memories of Umi and Fuu. Nova uses Hikaru`s feelings towards Lantis to break Hikaru`s determination. Hikaru`s fears and doubts cause her to fall deeper into the darkness. Can Presea help her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikaru and Friendships Torn Apart
Hikaru et l`amitié brisée !
Hikaru to Hikisakareta Yuujou
光と引き裂かれた友情

REGULAR.description:
Umi, held captive by the mobile fortress Bravada, is forced into an outfit from Chizeta and then locked into a cage. The younger princess, Tarta, feels deep anger watching Umi, challenges Umi to a swordfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umi and the Ambition of Tarta and Tatra
Umi et la machination de Tarta et Tatra !
Umi to Tarta/Tatra no Yabou
海とタータ・タトラの野望

REGULAR.description:
Fuu, held captive aboard the Dome of Fahren, is brought before Aska. Upon hearing that the Rune-God is alive, Aska begs Fuu for one of her own. Fuu gently declines, but Aska doesn`t listen. Fuu suggests an archery match, saying that if Aska wins she can have her Rune-God, but if she wins, she must be returned to Cephiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuu Tai Aska! Inochigake no Yumi Shoubu
Fuu versus Aska! Life or Death Archery Match
Fû contre Aska ! Duel mortel à l`arc
風 対 アスカ! 命がけの弓勝負

REGULAR.description:
Aska tries to keep Fuu aboard the Dome, but Ferio jumps into the scene and rescues her! However, Hikaru`s battle with Nova seems to be all but lost. Can Presea`s desperate pleas to Hikaru reach the Magic Knight`s heart?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reviens à la vie, épée de Hikaru !
Revive, Hikaru`s Sword!
Yomigaere! Hikaru no Ken
甦れ! 光の剣

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru has returned after reviving Rayearth`s sword, but doesn`t remember confessing her love to Lantis! Hikaru later bumps into him in the castle garden en route to see Clef. Meanwhile, aboard the bridge of Autozam`s battleship NSX, Eagle commands for the launch of the Laguna Cannon to see how Cephiro will react. The attack on Cephiro castle has finally begun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eagle ! L`attaque du château de Cefiro
Eagle Cephiro Shiro Soukougeki
Eagle`s All-out Attack on Cephiro Castle
イーグル・セフィーロ城総攻撃!

REGULAR.description:
Eagle, in combination with Geo`s GTO, manages to break the barrier and enter Cephiro Castle. Inside, Alcyone responds to Debonair`s call and allows the dark lady and her monsters to enter the castle! Selece and Windam attempt to block the GTO. Meanwhile Lantis heads for the top floor to confront Debonair at the crown room.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cephiro Shiro Dai Konsen!
Chaotic War at Cephiro Castle
La grande bataille du château de Cefiro
セフィーロ城大混戦!

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru dreams of Cephiro from when it was peaceful. There, she sees the conversation between Lantis and Zagato, with princess Emeraude watching from behind the columns. Zagato asks Lantis about the Pillar system, and he answers...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Court répit pour les Magic Knights !
Magic Knights and Their Momentary Respite
Mahou Kishi to Hitotoki no Yasuragi
魔法騎士とひとときの安らぎ

REGULAR.description:
Umi and Fuu continue fighting the monsters in the castle`s residential quarters. Hikaru chases after Nova, who had threatened to kill Lantis. Nova finds him with Eagle, and promptly attacks! Meanwhile, Umi and Fuu are struggling against the monsters, but they realize that the black sphere is taking in the children`s fear to create monsters
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le combat contre Nova et la véritable nature des monstres !
Nova to no Tatakai to Mamono no Shoutai
Nova`s Battle, and the Monster`s Identity
ノヴァとの戦いと魔物の正体

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru confesses her dreams concerning Nova and Debonair since she got back to Tokyo. Geo, worried by the loss of communication with Eagle, decides to attack. Just then, Aska`s Dome reappears! Seeing that the Run-Gods are not out to battle, Aska thinks that Fuu has been defeated and calls giant Sang Yung to protect her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giant Sang Yung versus the NSX
Kyodai Sang Yung VS NSX!
Sang Yung géant contre NSX !
巨大サンユン VS NSX!

REGULAR.description:
Eagle escapes from his cell and searches the castle for a way into the crown room. Since Eagle has biological data on Lantis, the intruder searchers for him and his sword. Eagle finds Lantis interrogating Alcyone and the two confront each other. Lantis sets to attack when Hikaru suddenly jumps into the battle! Meanwhile, Clef`s rig and Lantis` sword start to glimmer...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La salle de la Couronne et la mémoire du Pilier
Oukan no Heya to Hashira no Kioku
The Crown Room and the Pillar`s Memory
王冠の部屋と柱の記憶

REGULAR.description:
The crown starts to change shape as Hikaru and Eagle both safely enter the crown room. But which will become the new Pillar of Cephiro? Just then, Tarta and Tatra of Chizeta arrive aboard the Bravada. Umi leaves Ascot to protect the castle and heads out. Tarta and Tatra challenge her to a personal duel. They tell Umi that if she wins they will stop their invasion of Cephiro...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Serious Match - Umi vs. Tarta & Tatra
Combat décisif ! Umi contre Tarta et Tatra !
Shinken Shoubu! Umi VS Tarta/Tatra
真剣勝負! 海 VS タータ・タトラ

REGULAR.description:
As Umi and Fuu are continuing to fight the invasion of monsters storming the castle they discover the source of the monster`s power are the children`s fears being taken in like a big black ominous cloud spreading. Worried he hasn`t been able to contact Eagle Geo makes the decision to attack, just then Aska shows up, not seeing the Rune Gods around she assumes that they have been defeated and calls out Sang Yung to protect her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cornered! Lantis` Crisis
Situation critique ! Lantis en danger !
Zettai Zetsumei! Lantis no Kiki
絶対絶命! ランティスの危機

REGULAR.description:
Eagle having been captured breaks out and starts searching for Lantis with his bio info he can then access the crown room. Lantis continues to interrogate Alcyone when Eagle confronts Lantis then all of a sudden Hikaru jumps into the middle of it as well.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikaru Shocked! The Truth About Nova
Hikaru: Shougeki! Nova no Shinjitsu
Un choc pour Hikaru ! La vérité sur Nova !
光・衝撃! ノヴァの真実

REGULAR.description:
The Crown room allows but Hikaru and eagle to enter but who will be able to handle or touch the crown to determine the new Pillar?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Qui sera le nouveau Pilier ? Hikaru ou Eagle ?
Shin no Hashira wa!? Hikaru ka, Eagle ka!?
Who Is the True Pillar!? Hikaru, or Eagle!?
真の柱は!? 光か, イーグルか!?

REGULAR.description:
During the fight with Regalia, Hikaru tries reaching out to Nova who disbelieves what everyone says about Debonair while the new allies help comfort people in the castle. Lantis is trapped inside the rogue Rune God...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Endless Battle
Hateshinai Tatakai!
Un combat sans fin !
果てしない戦い!

REGULAR.description:
Nova is now back in Hikaru`s heart where she belongs. With her dying breath, Alcyone unveils Debonair`s location: Cephiro`s alternate realm. The Magic Knights and their Rune Gods are ready to end the struggle once and for all...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le chemin de la victoire ! L`avenir appartient à ceux qui ont la foi !
Shouri e no Michi! Shinjiru Kokoro ga Hiraku Asu!
The Path to Victory! A Tomorrow that a Believing Heart Opens!
勝利への道! 信じる心が開く明日!

titles.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
As Guerreiras Mágicas de Rayearth
Guerreiras Mágicas de Rayearth
Las Guerreras Mágicas
Las Guerreras Mágicas
Magic Knight RayEarth
Magic Knight Rayearth
Magic Knight Rayearth
Wojowniczki z Krainy Marzeń
เมจิคไนท์ เรย์เอิร์ธ
魔法騎士[マジックナイト]レイアース
MKR
MKRE
MKRTV
Mahou Kishi Rayearth
Una Porta Socchiusa ai Confini del Sole
Рейърт и магическите рицари

마법기사 레이어스
